product_description: Polished zip hardware with leather trim fronts a smart belt bag perfectly sized for vacations or a walk around the city.
product_details_and_care:
Polished zip hardware with leather trim fronts a smart belt bag perfectly sized for vacations or a walk around the city. This durable and compact style can be worn slung over your shoulder or secured around your waist for hands-free convenience.
Zip-front closure
Adjustable waist belt
Lined
Polyester or Cotton
